document.full_text: a miniature train at a south carolina park derailed and overturned on saturday, killing a 6-year-old child and injuring at least 18 other people, authorities said.
document.title: miniature train derails at park, killing 6-year-old child
lines_and_colors: a miniature train at a south carolina park derailed and overturned on saturday, killing a 6-year-old child and injuring at least 18 other people, authorities said.
